channel.title: Adding clans in beyond rsc
channel.description:
i like beyond since its built in point system but anyway here are my errors 3 different versions on my comp 3 errors
http://img442.imageshack.us/i/clanerror.jpg/ thats with the command handler having the clans
http://img413.imageshack.us/i/clanerror2.jpg/ thats another error with another method i used
http://img62.imageshack.us/i/clanerror3.jpg/ and this is with no commands on both of them im thinkin the last one is cuz the client side isnt fixed yet
any help is appreciated

item.title: Adding clans in beyond rsc
item.dc:creator: @da_real_hype da real hype
item.description:
@da_real_hype wrote:

did what both of u said didn’t work still getting same error

http://pastebin.com/kzKbi1BM

thats the command handler where i’m getting the problem you’ll see its in the set event command thats been there since day 1

got it down to 1 error by putting in Player Player but it doesnt fix the set event one, i tried taking it out and i get 2 more errors

Read full topic

p is already defined as a packet try (Player player :

item.title: Adding clans in beyond rsc
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

You can’t define something that has already been defined in the same method. Make sure you have imported the clan files class.

import org.rscdaemon.server.model.ClanInvite;
import org.rscdaemon.server.model.ClanHandler;
import org.rscdaemon.server.model.Clan;

Make sure you have the player update packet for the clan added.

Read full topic
